name: Service Stations (with or without Ancillary Services)
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell fuel for consumer use and may or may not also
have a convenience store, car wash, or automotive repair shop on the
premises. This MCC includes service station merchants located at a
marina that have a separate merchant agreement from that of the
marina.
For transactions occurring at unattended automated fuel
dispensers, use MCC 5542.
For electric vehicle charging services, use MCC 5552.
